00040 const std::string FILE_INPUT = "from-model-file";
00041 const std::string TOTAL_MODEL_COUNT = "total-model-count";
00042 const std::string USED_FOR_PRIOR = "used-for-prior";
00043 const std::string OFFICIAL_AFFY = "official-affy-model";
00044 const std::string CHIP_ANALYSIS_TYPE = "chip-analysis-type";
00045 const std::string CHIP_TYPE = "chip-type";
00046 const std::string ARRAY_TYPE = "array-type";
00047 const std::string MODEL_TYPE = "model-type";
00048 const std::string ALGORITHM_NAME = "algorithm-name";
00049 const std::string FILE_TYPE = "file-type";
00050 const std::string REAGENT_KEY_VERSION = "reagent-key-version";
00051 const std::string FILE_TYPE_MODELS = "models";
00052 const std::string UNKNOWN_CHIP_TYPE = "UNKNOWN_CHIP";

00055   "_UNKNOWN_FILE",

00057   "_BIRDSEED_POSTERIOR",
00058   "_BRLMMP_MODEL",

00065 void SnpModelConverter::headersToMeta(TsvFile &tsv, SQLiteDatabase &db) {
00066     string key;
00067     string value;
00068     tsv.headersBegin();
00069     while (tsv.headersNext(key, value) == TSV_OK) {
00070         string sql = "insert into snp_model_meta values ('" + key + "','" + value + "');";
00071         db.execute(sql);
00072     }
00073 }
00074 
00075 SnpModelConverter::SnpModelFileType SnpModelConverter::guessFileType(const std::string &file) {
00076     if (File5_File::isHdf5file(file)) {
00077         return BRLMMP_MODEL_HDF5;
00078     }
00079     else if (SnpModelDb::isSqlModelFile(file)) { 
00080         return SQLITE_MODEL_FILE;
00081     }
00082     else {
00083         return guessTsvFileType(file);
00084     }
00085     return UNKNOWN_FILE;
00086 }
00087 
00088 void SnpModelConverter::convertToDbModel(const std::string &fileIn, const std::string &fileOut, const std::string &file5Path) {
00089     if (m_FileType == UNKNOWN_FILE) {
00090         m_FileType = guessFileType(fileIn);
00091     }
00092     Verbose::out(2, "File " + fileIn + " is type is: " + ToStr(m_FileType));
00093     if (m_FileType == SnpModelConverter::BIRDSEED_PRIOR) {
00094         convertBirdseedPriorToDbModel(fileIn, fileOut);
00095     }
00096     else if (m_FileType == SnpModelConverter::BIRDSEED_POSTERIOR) {
00097         convertBirdseedPosteriorToDbModel(fileIn, fileOut);
00098     }
00099     else if (m_FileType == SnpModelConverter::BRLMMP_MODEL) {
00100         convertBrlmmPToDbModel(fileIn, fileOut);
00101     }
00102     else if (m_FileType == SnpModelConverter::BRLMMP_MODEL_HDF5) {
00103         convertBrlmmPFile5ToDbModel(fileIn, file5Path, fileOut);
00104     }
00105     else if (m_FileType == SnpModelConverter::SQLITE_MODEL_FILE) {
00106         Verbose::out(2, "File " + fileIn + " is already a db.");
00107     }
00108     else {
00109         APT_ERR_ABORT("File " + fileIn + " is an unknown model type: " + ToStr(m_FileType));
00110     }
00111 }
00112 
00113 SnpModelConverter::SnpModelFileType SnpModelConverter::guessTsvFileType(const std::string &file) {
00114     RowFile rf;
00115     rf.open(file);
00116     vector<string> words;
00117     rf.nextRow(words);
00118     if (words.size() >= 5 && words[0] == "id" && words[1] == "BB" && words[2] == "AB" && words[3] == "AA" && words[4] == "CV") {
00119         return BRLMMP_MODEL;
00120     }
00121     else if (words.size() >= 5 && words [0] == "probeset_id" && words[1] == "copy_number" && words[2] == "BB" && words[3] == "AB" && words[4] =="AA") {
00122         return BIRDSEED_PRIOR;
00123     }
00124     else if (words.size() == 1 && words[0].find("SNP_") != string::npos && words[0].find(';') != string::npos) {
00125         return BIRDSEED_POSTERIOR;
00126     }
00127     return UNKNOWN_FILE;
00128 }
00129 
00130 void SnpModelConverter::convertBrlmmPToDbModel(const std::string &fileIn, const std::string &fileOut) {
00131     SnpModelDb snpDb(fileOut);
00132     void setupTables();  
00133     
00134     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00135     tsv.open(fileIn);
00136 
00137     snpDb.setupTables();
00138     string key, value;
00139     tsv.headersBegin();
00140     while (tsv.headersNext(key, value) == TSV_OK) {
00141         snpDb.addMeta(key, value);
00142     }
00143     vector<string> chipTypes;
00144     tsv.getHeader("chip_type", chipTypes);
00145     if (chipTypes.size() == 0) {
00146         tsv.getHeader(CHIP_TYPE, chipTypes);
00147     }
00148     int numProbesets;
00149     if (TSV_OK != tsv.getHeader(TOTAL_MODEL_COUNT, numProbesets)) {
00150         enum SnpChipType type = m_ChipType;
00151         if (type == UNKNOWN_CHIP) {
00152             type = guessChipType(m_FileType, chipTypes, "");
00153         }
00154         numProbesets = guessNumProbesets(type);
00155     }
00156     string aa, ab, bb, id,cv;
00157     // This is the "v1" format with comma seperated values...
00158     tsv.bind(0,"id", &id, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00159     tsv.bind(0,"BB", &bb, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00160     tsv.bind(0,"AB", &ab, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00161     tsv.bind(0,"AA", &aa, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00162 
00163     int fc_cidx=tsv.cname2cidx(0,"CV");
00164     if (fc_cidx!=affx::TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND) {
00165         tsv.bind(0,"CV", &cv, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00166         ;  }
00167     else {
00168         cv = "0,0,0";
00169     }
00170     int iCount = 0;
00171     string first;
00172     try {
00173         unsigned int dotMod = max(numProbesets/20,1);
00174         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Indexing " + ToStr(numProbesets) + " Probesets", 20, dotMod, numProbesets);
00175         snpDb.prepareToWriteModels(numProbesets);
00176         while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00177             Verbose::progressStep(1);
00178             if (first.empty()) {
00179                 first = id;
00180             }
00181             snp_labeled_distribution p = QuantLabelZ__CreatePriorFromStrings(bb,ab,aa,cv);
00182             p.probeset_id = id;
00183             snpDb.writeSnpDistribution(p);
00184             iCount++;
00185         }
00186         snpDb.doneWriteModels();
00187         snpDb.addMeta(TOTAL_MODEL_COUNT, ToStr(iCount));
00188         string file = Fs::basename(fileIn);
00189         snpDb.addMeta(FILE_INPUT, file);
00190         snpDb.addMeta(MODEL_TYPE, ToStr(m_FileType));
00191         if (m_ChipType == UNKNOWN_CHIP) {
00192             m_ChipType = guessChipType(m_FileType, chipTypes, first);
00193         }
00194         snpDb.addMeta(CHIP_ANALYSIS_TYPE, ToStr(m_ChipType));
00195                 string arrayType = UNKNOWN_CHIP_TYPE;
00196                 if (chipTypes.size() > 0)
00197                         arrayType = chipTypes[0];
00198         snpDb.addMeta(ARRAY_TYPE, arrayType);
00199         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
00200     }
00201     catch (SQLiteException &e) {
00202         Err::errAbort("Got Exception at record: " + ToStr(iCount) + " " + e.getMessage());
00203     }
00204 
00205     tsv.close();  
00206 }
00207 
00208 bool SnpModelConverter::vecContains(const std::string &needle, const std::vector<std::string> &haystack) {
00209     for (int i = 0; i < haystack.size(); i++) {
00210         if (haystack[i].find(needle) != string::npos) {
00211             return true;
00212         }
00213     }
00214     return false;
00215 }
00216 
00217 int SnpModelConverter::guessNumProbesets(enum SnpModelConverter::SnpChipType type) {
00218     int num = 500000;
00219     if (type == AXIOM) {
00220         num = 582406;
00221     }
00222     else if (type == SNP6) {
00223         num = 972549;
00224     }
00225     else if (type == SNP5) {
00226         num = 513865;
00227     }
00228     Verbose::out(2, "Num probesets guess is: " + ToStr(num));
00229     return num;
00230 }
00231 
00232 enum SnpModelConverter::SnpChipType SnpModelConverter::guessChipType(enum SnpModelConverter::SnpModelFileType modelType,
00233                                                                      const std::vector<std::string> &chipTypes, 
00234                                                                      const std::string &firstPsName) {
00235     enum SnpModelConverter::SnpChipType type = UNKNOWN_CHIP;
00236     // Believe the chip-type
00237     if (vecContains("Axiom", chipTypes)) {
00238         type = AXIOM;
00239     }
00240     else if(vecContains("GenomeWideSNP_6", chipTypes) || vecContains("GenomeWideEx_6", chipTypes)) {
00241         type = SNP6;
00242     }
00243     else if(vecContains("GenomeWideSNP_5", chipTypes)) {
00244         type = SNP5;
00245     }
00246 
00247     // Guess based on type, birdseed only really for snp6
00248     else if (modelType == BIRDSEED_PRIOR || modelType == BIRDSEED_POSTERIOR) {
00249         type = SNP6;
00250     }
00251     
00252     // Guess based on first probeset name
00253     if (firstPsName == "SNP_A-1780520") {
00254         type = SNP5;
00255     }
00256     else if (firstPsName == "AFFX-SNP_10000979") {
00257         type = SNP6;
00258     }
00259     else if (firstPsName == "AX-11086525" || firstPsName.find("AX-") == 0) {
00260         type = AXIOM;
00261     }
00262     Verbose::out(2, "Chip Type is: " + ToStr(type));
00263     return type;
00264 }
00265 
00266 
00267 void SnpModelConverter::convertBrlmmPFile5ToDbModel(const std::string &fileIn, const std::string &file5Path, const std::string &fileOut) {
00268     SnpModelDb snpDb(fileOut);
00269     void setupTables();  
00270 
00271     affx::File5_File* file5 = NULL;
00272     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00273     string path = file5Path;
00274     file5 = new affx::File5_File();
00275     file5->open(fileIn,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00276     if (path.length() == 0) {
00277         affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
00278         group5 = file5->openGroup("/",affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00279         vector<string> names = group5->listNames();
00280         for (int i = 0; i < names.size(); i++) {
00281             if (names[i].find(".snp-posteriors") != string::npos) {
00282                 path = names[i];
00283                 break;
00284             }
00285             
00286         }
00287         if (path.length() == 0) {
00288             APT_ERR_ABORT("Don't recognize this type of posterior file.");
00289         }
00290         group5->close();
00291         Freez(group5);
00292     }
00293 
00294     tsv5 = file5->openTsv(path);
00295 
00296     int numProbesets = tsv5->getLineCount();
00297     int iCount = 0;
00298     try {
00299         snpDb.setupTables();
00300         string key, value;
00301         for (int i = 0; i < tsv5->getHeaderCount(); i++) {
00302             tsv5->getHeaderByIdx(i, &key, &value);
00303             snpDb.addMeta(key, value);
00304         }
00305         
00306         vector<string> chipTypes;
00307         string type;
00308         tsv5->getHeader("chip_type", &type);
00309         chipTypes.push_back(type);
00310 
00311         string first;
00312         snp_labeled_distribution p;
00313         p.Dist.Clear();
00314         snpDb.prepareToWriteModels(numProbesets);
00315         unsigned int dotMod = max(numProbesets/20,1);
00316         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Indexing " + ToStr(numProbesets) + " Probesets", 20, dotMod, numProbesets);
00317         while (tsv5->nextLevel(0) == affx::FILE5_OK) {
00318             Verbose::progressStep(1);
00319             tsv5->get(0,0, &p.probeset_id);
00320             if (first.empty()) {
00321                 first = p.probeset_id;
00322             }
00323             QuantLabelZ__readSnpPrior_tsv5_v2(tsv5, p.Dist);
00324             snpDb.writeSnpDistribution(p);
00325             iCount++;
00326         }
00327         snpDb.doneWriteModels();
00328         snpDb.addMeta(TOTAL_MODEL_COUNT, ToStr(iCount));
00329         string file = Fs::basename(fileIn);
00330         snpDb.addMeta(FILE_INPUT, file);
00331         snpDb.addMeta(MODEL_TYPE, ToStr(m_FileType));
00332         if (m_ChipType == UNKNOWN_CHIP) {
00333             m_ChipType = guessChipType(m_FileType, chipTypes, first);
00334         }
00335         snpDb.addMeta(CHIP_ANALYSIS_TYPE, ToStr(m_ChipType));
00336         snpDb.addMeta(ARRAY_TYPE, type);
00337         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
00338     }
00339     catch (SQLiteException &e) {
00340         Err::errAbort("Got Exception at record: " + ToStr(iCount) + " " + e.getMessage());
00341     }
00342     tsv5->close();
00343     delete tsv5;
00344     file5->close();
00345     delete file5;
00346 }

00348 
00349 void SnpModelConverter::birdseedStringToCluster(const std::string &s, char sep, cluster_data &d) {
00350     vector<string> words;
00351     if (s != "null") {
00352         Util::chopString(s, sep, words);
00353         APT_ERR_ASSERT(words.size() == 6, "Birdseed cluster malformed: " + s);
00354         d.m = Convert::toDouble(words[0]);
00355         d.ym = Convert::toDouble(words[1]);
00356         d.ss = Convert::toDouble(words[2]);
00357         d.xyss = Convert::toDouble(words[3]);
00358         d.yss = Convert::toDouble(words[4]);
00359         d.k = Convert::toDouble(words[5]);
00360         d.v = Convert::toDouble(words[5]);
00361     }
00362     else {
00363         d.m = 0;
00364         d.ym = 0;
00365         d.ss = 0;
00366         d.xyss = 0;
00367         d.yss = 0;
00368         d.k = 0;
00369         d.v = 0;
00370     }
00371 }
00372 
00373 void SnpModelConverter::birdseedModelFromStrings(const std::string &name,
00374                                                  int copynumber,
00375                                                  const std::string &bb, 
00376                                                  const std::string &ab, 
00377                                                  const std::string &aa,
00378                                                  char sep,
00379                                                  snp_labeled_distribution &p) {
00380     p.Dist.Clear();
00381     if (copynumber == 1) {
00382         p.probeset_id = name + ":" + ToStr(copynumber);
00383     }
00384     else {
00385         p.probeset_id = name;
00386     }
00387     birdseedStringToCluster(bb, sep, p.Dist.bb);
00388     birdseedStringToCluster(ab, sep, p.Dist.ab);
00389     birdseedStringToCluster(aa, sep, p.Dist.aa);
00390 }
00391 
00392 void SnpModelConverter::convertBirdseedPriorToDbModel(const std::string &fileIn, const std::string &fileOut) {
00393     SnpModelDb snpDb(fileOut);
00394     void setupTables();  
00395     
00396     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00397     tsv.open(fileIn);
00398 
00399 
00400     snpDb.setupTables();
00401     string key, value;
00402     tsv.headersBegin();
00403     while (tsv.headersNext(key, value) == TSV_OK) {
00404         snpDb.addMeta(key, value);
00405     }
00406     vector<string> chipTypes;
00407     tsv.getHeader("chip_type", chipTypes);    
00408     if (chipTypes.size() == 0) {
00409         tsv.getHeader(CHIP_TYPE, chipTypes);
00410     }
00411     int numProbesets;
00412     if (TSV_OK != tsv.getHeader(TOTAL_MODEL_COUNT, numProbesets)) {
00413         enum SnpChipType type = m_ChipType;
00414         if (type == UNKNOWN_CHIP) {
00415             type = guessChipType(m_FileType, chipTypes, "");
00416         }
00417         numProbesets = guessNumProbesets(type);
00418     }
00419 
00420     string aa, ab, bb, id;
00421     int copynumber;
00422     // This is the format with comma seperated values...
00423     tsv.bind(0,"probeset_id", &id, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00424     tsv.bind(0, "copy_number", &copynumber, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00425     // swap AA and BB when writing to database.  This is compensating for the
00426     // fact that the AA and BB clusters have swapped labels in the priors file.
00427     tsv.bind(0,"BB", &aa, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00428     tsv.bind(0,"AB", &ab, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00429     tsv.bind(0,"AA", &bb, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00430     int iCount = 0;
00431     snp_labeled_distribution p;
00432     p.Dist.Clear();
00433     string first;
00434     try {
00435         unsigned int dotMod = max(numProbesets/20,1);
00436         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Indexing " + ToStr(numProbesets) + " Probesets", 20, dotMod, numProbesets);
00437         snpDb.prepareToWriteModels(numProbesets);
00438         while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00439             Verbose::progressStep(1);
00440             if (first.empty()) {
00441                 first = id;
00442             }
00443             birdseedModelFromStrings(id, copynumber, bb, ab, aa, ',',  p);
00444             snpDb.writeSnpDistribution(p);
00445             iCount++;
00446         }
00447         snpDb.doneWriteModels();
00448         snpDb.addMeta(TOTAL_MODEL_COUNT, ToStr(iCount));
00449         string file = Fs::basename(fileIn);
00450         snpDb.addMeta(FILE_INPUT, file);
00451         snpDb.addMeta(MODEL_TYPE, ToStr(m_FileType));
00452         if (m_ChipType == UNKNOWN_CHIP) {
00453             m_ChipType = guessChipType(m_FileType, chipTypes, first);
00454         }
00455         snpDb.addMeta(CHIP_ANALYSIS_TYPE, ToStr(m_ChipType));
00456                 string arrayType = UNKNOWN_CHIP_TYPE;
00457                 if (chipTypes.size() > 0)
00458                         arrayType = chipTypes[0];
00459         snpDb.addMeta(ARRAY_TYPE, arrayType);
00460         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
00461     }
00462     catch (SQLiteException &e) {
00463         APT_ERR_ABORT("Got Exception at record: " + ToStr(iCount) + " " + e.getMessage());
00464     }
00465     tsv.close();  
00466 }
00467 
00468 void SnpModelConverter::addBirdseedPosteriorFromStrings(std::string &id, const std::string &aa, 
00469                                                         const std::string &ab, const std::string &bb,
00470                                                         snp_labeled_distribution &p) {
00471     size_t offset = id.rfind('-');
00472     APT_ERR_ASSERT(offset != string::npos, "Couldn't find copynumber in: " + id );
00473     string cpnumber = id.substr(offset+1,1);
00474     int copynumber = Convert::toInt(cpnumber);
00475     id = id.substr(0, offset);
00476     if (id == "SNP_A-1984828") {
00477         Verbose::out(1, "Here we come...");
00478     }
00479     if (copynumber == 1) {
00480         birdseedModelFromStrings(id, copynumber, ab, nullStr, aa, ' ', p);
00481     }
00482     else {
00483         birdseedModelFromStrings(id, copynumber, bb, ab, aa, ' ', p);
00484     }
00485     
00486 }
00487 
00488 void SnpModelConverter::convertBirdseedPosteriorToDbModel(const std::string &fileIn, const std::string &fileOut) {
00489     SnpModelDb snpDb(fileOut);
00490     void setupTables();  
00491     
00492     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00493     tsv.m_optFieldSep = ';';
00494     tsv.m_optAutoSenseSep = false;
00495     tsv.open(fileIn);
00496     int numProbesets;
00497 
00498     //    tsv.getHeader("rows", numProbesets);
00499 
00500     snpDb.setupTables();
00501     string key, value;
00502     tsv.headersBegin();
00503     while (tsv.headersNext(key, value) == TSV_OK) {
00504         snpDb.addMeta(key, value);
00505     }
00506     vector<string> chipTypes;
00507     tsv.getHeader("chip_type", chipTypes);
00508     if (chipTypes.size() == 0) {
00509         tsv.getHeader(CHIP_TYPE, chipTypes);
00510     }
00511     if (TSV_OK != tsv.getHeader(TOTAL_MODEL_COUNT, numProbesets)) {
00512         enum SnpChipType type = m_ChipType;
00513         if (type == UNKNOWN_CHIP) {
00514             type = guessChipType(m_FileType, chipTypes, "");
00515         }
00516         numProbesets = guessNumProbesets(type);
00517     }
00518     string aa, ab, bb, id;
00519     // This is the format with comma seperated values...
00520     tsv.bind(0, 0, &id, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00521     tsv.bind(0, 1, &aa, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00522     tsv.bind(0, 2, &ab, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00523     tsv.bind(0, 3, &bb, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00524 
00525     int iCount = 0;
00526     snp_labeled_distribution p;
00527     p.Dist.Clear();
00528 
00529     string first;
00530     try {
00531         unsigned int dotMod = max(numProbesets/20,1);
00532         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Indexing " + ToStr(numProbesets) + " Probesets", 20, dotMod, numProbesets);
00533         snpDb.prepareToWriteModels(numProbesets);
00534         // This is an odd little bit as TsvFile thinks that the first row is the header...
00535         id = tsv.getColumnName(0,0);
00536         aa = tsv.getColumnName(0,1);
00537         ab = tsv.getColumnName(0,2);
00538         bb = tsv.getColumnName(0,3);
00539         first = id;
00540         addBirdseedPosteriorFromStrings(id, aa, ab, bb, p);
00541         snpDb.writeSnpDistribution(p);
00542         while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00543             Verbose::progressStep(1);
00544             addBirdseedPosteriorFromStrings(id, aa, ab, bb, p);
00545             snpDb.writeSnpDistribution(p);
00546             iCount++;
00547             aa.clear();
00548             ab.clear();
00549             bb.clear();
00550         }
00551         snpDb.doneWriteModels();
00552         snpDb.addMeta(TOTAL_MODEL_COUNT, ToStr(iCount));
00553         string file = Fs::basename(fileIn);
00554         snpDb.addMeta(FILE_INPUT, file);
00555         snpDb.addMeta(MODEL_TYPE, ToStr(m_FileType));
00556         if (m_ChipType == UNKNOWN_CHIP) {
00557             m_ChipType = guessChipType(m_FileType, chipTypes, first);
00558         }
00559         snpDb.addMeta(CHIP_ANALYSIS_TYPE, ToStr(m_ChipType));
00560                 string arrayType = UNKNOWN_CHIP_TYPE;
00561                 if (chipTypes.size() > 0)
00562                         arrayType = chipTypes[0];
00563         snpDb.addMeta(ARRAY_TYPE, arrayType);
00564                 Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
00565     }
00566     catch (SQLiteException &e) {
00567         APT_ERR_ABORT("Got Exception at record: " + ToStr(iCount) + " " + e.getMessage());
00568     }
00569     tsv.close();  
00570 }
00571 
00572 std::string SnpModelConverter::getHd5ArrayTypeAndAlgorithm(const std::string &fileIn, enum SnpModelFileType ft, std::string &alg)
00573 {
00574         string arrayType = UNKNOWN_CHIP_TYPE;
00575         affx::File5_File* file5 = NULL;
00576         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00577         file5 = new affx::File5_File();
00578         file5->open(fileIn,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00579         string path = "";
00580         affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5->openGroup("/",affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00581         vector<string> names = group5->listNames();
00582         for (int i = 0; i < names.size(); i++) {
00583                 if (names[i].find(".snp-posteriors") != string::npos) {
00584                         path = names[i];
00585                         break;
00586                 }
00587         }
00588         if (path.length() > 0)          // valid .A5 (posterior) file
00589         {
00590                 tsv5 = file5->openTsv(path);
00591         string type;
00592                 tsv5->getHeader("chip_type", &type);
00593                 if (!type.empty())
00594                         arrayType = type;
00595             tsv5->close();
00596             delete tsv5;
00597         }
00598         string tempAlg;
00599         tsv5->getHeader(ALGORITHM_NAME, &tempAlg);
00600         if (!tempAlg.empty())
00601                 alg = tempAlg;
00602         group5->close();
00603         Freez(group5);
00604     file5->close();
00605     delete file5;
00606         return arrayType;
00607 }
00608 
00609 std::string SnpModelConverter::getTsvArrayTypeAndAlgorithm(const std::string &fileIn, enum SnpModelFileType ft, std::string &alg)
00610 {
00611         string arrayType = UNKNOWN_CHIP_TYPE;
00612         affx::TsvFile tsv;
00613         tsv.open(fileIn);
00614     tsv.headersBegin();
00615         vector<string> chipTypes;
00616         tsv.getHeaderMatchingKeySubstr("chip_type", chipTypes);
00617         if (chipTypes.size() == 0)
00618                 tsv.getHeaderMatchingKeySubstrAppend(CHIP_TYPE, chipTypes);
00619         if (chipTypes.size() > 0)
00620                 arrayType = chipTypes[0];
00621         string tempAlg;
00622         if (tsv.getHeader(ALGORITHM_NAME, tempAlg) == TSV_OK)
00623                 alg = tempAlg;
00624         return arrayType;
00625 }
00626 
00627 void SnpModelConverter::getArrayTypeAndAlgorithm(const std::string &fileIn, std::vector<std::string> &result) {
00628         string alg = "";
00629         string arrayType = "";
00630         try {
00631                 result.clear();
00632                 enum SnpModelFileType ft = guessFileType(fileIn);
00633                 if (ft == SQLITE_MODEL_FILE)
00634                 {
00635                         SnpModelDb snpDb;
00636                         snpDb.open(fileIn);
00637                         vector<string> values;
00638                         snpDb.getMetaValue(ALGORITHM_NAME, values);
00639                         if (values.size() == 0) {
00640                                 snpDb.getMetaValue(MODEL_TYPE, values);
00641                                 if (values.size() == 0) {
00642                                         alg = SnpModelFileType_str[UNKNOWN_FILE];
00643                                 }
00644                                 else {
00645                                         alg = SnpModelFileType_str[atoi(values[0].c_str())];
00646                                 }
00647                         }
00648                         else {
00649                                 alg = values[0];
00650                         }
00651                         snpDb.getMetaValue(ARRAY_TYPE, values);
00652                         snpDb.close();
00653                         if (values.size() == 0) {
00654                                 arrayType = UNKNOWN_CHIP;
00655                         }
00656                         else {
00657                                 arrayType = values[0];
00658                         }
00659 
00660                 }
00661                 else
00662                 {
00663                         alg = SnpModelFileType_str[ft];
00664                         if (ft == BRLMMP_MODEL_HDF5) {
00665                                 alg = SnpModelFileType_str[BRLMMP_MODEL];
00666                                 arrayType = getHd5ArrayTypeAndAlgorithm(fileIn, ft, alg);
00667                         }
00668                         else {
00669                                 arrayType = getTsvArrayTypeAndAlgorithm(fileIn, ft, alg);
00670                         }
00671                 }
00672         }
00673     catch (SQLiteException &e) {
00674       Verbose::out(2,"SnpModelConverter::getArrayTypeAndAlgorithm got exception: " + e.getMessage());
00675     }
00676     catch (Exception &e){
00677       string s = string(e.what());
00678       Verbose::out(2,"SnpModelConverter::getArrayTypeAndAlgorithm got exception: " + s);
00679     }
00680     catch (...) {
00681       Verbose::out(2,"SnpModelConverter::getArrayTypeAndAlgorithm got exception");
00682     }
00683         result.push_back(arrayType);
00684         result.push_back(alg);
00685 }

00832 
00833 static void _SnpModelConverter_AddHeaderToHeaderMap(std::map< std::string, std::string *> & headerMap, const char * headerMapValueDelimiter, const std::string & key, const std::string & value);
00834 // GTC 4.1 Mapped header callback.
00835 static void addDerivedHeadersCallback_GTC4_1(std::map< std::string, std::string *> & headerMap,
00836     const std::vector< SnpModelConverterValidation > & validations,
00837                                              std::map< std::string, std::string > & derivedMap,
00838                                              const char * headerMapValueDelimiter);
00839 
00840 // Register new Header Type callbacks here.
00841 const SnpModelConverterAddDerivedHeadersCallback SMC_ADD_DERIVED_HEADERS_CALLBACK[] = {
00842   { SnpModelConverter::NONE, NULL },
00843   { SnpModelConverter::GTC4_1, addDerivedHeadersCallback_GTC4_1 },
00844 };
00845 /*****************************************************************************
00846  * SnpModelGetHeaders: Header Type Call Back Functions.
00847  *****************************************************************************/
00848 /*****************************************************************************/
00849 /**
00850  * addDerivedHeadersCallback_GTC4_1:
00851  * This api assumes the headers and data have been validated.
00852  * Further the derived data values of algorithm and model type
00853  * may also be provided for possible use.
00854  *
00855  * @param headerMap     - file headers.
00856  * @param validations   - normalized headers
00857  * @param derivedMap    - data headers.
00858  *
00859  * @return headerMap    - Final mapping including the derived values.
00860  *
00861  */
00862 /*****************************************************************************/
00863 static void addDerivedHeadersCallback_GTC4_1(std::map< std::string, std::string *> & headerMap,
00864     const std::vector< SnpModelConverterValidation > & validations,
00865                                              std::map< std::string, std::string > & derivedMap,
00866                                              const char * headerMapValueDelimiter)
00867 {
00868 
00869 
00870   std::vector< SnpModelConverterValidation >::const_iterator it;
00871   std::map< std::string, std::string > newHeaderMap;
00872   
00873   // FIX UP DERIVED HEADERS
00874   if(derivedMap.count(ALGORITHM_NAME)) {
00875     std::string algorithmName(derivedMap[ALGORITHM_NAME]);
00876     for(int i = 0; i < SnpModelConverter::LAST_MODEL_TYPE; i++) {
00877       if(algorithmName == SnpModelFileType_str[i]) {
00878         switch(i) {
00879         case SnpModelConverter::BIRDSEED_PRIOR:
00880           derivedMap[ALGORITHM_NAME] = SNP_MODEL_ALGORITHM_TYPE_GTC[SMC_GH_ALGORITHM_BIRDSEED];
00881           derivedMap[MODEL_TYPE] = SNP_MODEL_MODEL_TYPE_GTC[SMC_GH_MODEL_PRIOR];
00882           break;
00883         case SnpModelConverter::BIRDSEED_POSTERIOR:
00884           derivedMap[ALGORITHM_NAME] = SNP_MODEL_ALGORITHM_TYPE_GTC[SMC_GH_ALGORITHM_BIRDSEED];
00885           derivedMap[MODEL_TYPE] = SNP_MODEL_MODEL_TYPE_GTC[SMC_GH_MODEL_POSTERIOR];
00886           break;
00887         case SnpModelConverter::BRLMMP_MODEL:
00888         case SnpModelConverter::BRLMMP_MODEL_HDF5:
00889           derivedMap[ALGORITHM_NAME] = SNP_MODEL_ALGORITHM_TYPE_GTC[SMC_GH_ALGORITHM_BRLMMP];
00890           derivedMap[MODEL_TYPE] = SNP_MODEL_MODEL_TYPE_GTC[SMC_GH_MODEL_UNKNOWN];
00891           break;
00892         case SnpModelConverter::SQLITE_MODEL_FILE:
00893         case SnpModelConverter::UNKNOWN_FILE:
00894         default:
00895           break;
00896         }
00897         break;
00898       }
00899     }
00900   }
00901   // FIX UP HEADER MAP VALUES
00902   if ( !headerMap.count(FILE_TYPE) ) {
00903     headerMap[FILE_TYPE] = new std::string(FILE_TYPE_MODELS);
00904   }
00905   else if(derivedMap.count(MODEL_TYPE) && !headerMap.count(MODEL_TYPE)) {
00906       headerMap[MODEL_TYPE] = new std::string(derivedMap[MODEL_TYPE]);
00907   }
00908   else {
00909     headerMap[MODEL_TYPE] = new std::string(SNP_MODEL_MODEL_TYPE_GTC[SMC_GH_MODEL_UNKNOWN]);
00910   }
00911 
00912   if ( !headerMap.count(REAGENT_KEY_VERSION) ) {
00913     headerMap[REAGENT_KEY_VERSION] = new std::string("");
00914   }
00915   // Always defer to the data version
00916   if(derivedMap.count(ALGORITHM_NAME) ) {
00917     headerMap[ALGORITHM_NAME] = new std::string(derivedMap[ALGORITHM_NAME]);
00918   }
00919 
00920   if(derivedMap.count(CHIP_TYPE) && !headerMap.count(CHIP_TYPE) ) {
00921     headerMap[CHIP_TYPE] = new std::string(derivedMap[CHIP_TYPE]);
00922   }
00923 
00924   //All validated headers.
00925   //The validation routine matched all ambiguous headers, not
00926   //just the duplicates.
00927   //File headers always take precedence. 
00928   for(it = validations.begin(); it != validations.end(); it++) {
00929     if ( (it->m_name == ALGORITHM_NAME) && headerMap.count(ALGORITHM_NAME) ) {
00930       continue;
00931     }
00932     if ( !it->m_value.empty() && (it->m_name != FILE_TYPE) ) {
00933       if ( headerMap[it->m_name] != NULL ) {
00934         delete headerMap[it->m_name];
00935       }
00936       headerMap[it->m_name] = new std::string(it->m_value);
00937       if((it->m_name == MODEL_TYPE)  && pcrecpp::RE("\\d+").FullMatch(it->m_value) && headerMap.count("SnpPosteriorFormatVer") ){
00938         *(headerMap[it->m_name]) = SNP_MODEL_MODEL_TYPE_GTC[SMC_GH_MODEL_POSTERIOR];
00939       }
00940     }
00941   }
00942 
00943 }
00944 // end addDerivedHeadersCallback_GTC4_1
00945 /*****************************************************************************/
00946 /*****************************************************************************/
00947 /**
00948  * SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders, Add Multiple Values Delimited HELPER
00949  * _SnpModelConverter_AddHeaderToHeaderMap
00950  *
00951  * @param modelFilePath - the models file, posterior or prior
00952  * @param headerMap     - returned with updated values for key.
00953  * @param key           - header key to update.
00954  * @param value         - possible multi-value to append to the key's
00955  *                        value.
00956  * @param headerMapValueDelimiter
00957  *                      - multiple value delimiter
00958  *
00959  * @return headerMap    - key/value pair set..
00960  *
00961  */
00962 /*****************************************************************************/
00963 static void _SnpModelConverter_AddHeaderToHeaderMap(std::map< std::string, std::string *> & headerMap, const char * headerMapValueDelimiter, const std::string & key, const std::string & value)
00964 {
00965   if(headerMap.count(key) == 0) {
00966     headerMap[key] = new std::string(value);
00967   } else if(headerMapValueDelimiter != NULL) {
00968     std::stringstream newVal;
00969     newVal << *(headerMap[key]) << headerMapValueDelimiter << value;
00970     *(headerMap[key]) = newVal.str();
00971   }
00972 }
00973 
00974 static void _SnpModelConverter_AddHeaderToHeaderMap(std::vector< std::string > & headerMatch, const char * headerMapValueDelimiter, const std::string & key, const std::string & value)
00975 {
00976 
00977   if (  headerMatch.size() != 2) {
00978     return;
00979   }
00980   
00981   std::map< std::string, std::string *> dummy;
00982 
00983   dummy[headerMatch[0]] = &headerMatch[1];
00984   _SnpModelConverter_AddHeaderToHeaderMap(dummy, headerMapValueDelimiter, key, value);
00985   
00986 }
00987 // end _SnpModelConverter_AddHeaderToHeaderMap
00988 /*****************************************************************************/
00989 /*****************************************************************************/
00990 /**
00991  * SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders, Hdf5 header and data parser HELPER.
00992  * _SnpModelConverter_Hdf5GetModelHeaders
00993  *
00994  * @param modelFilePath - the models file, posterior or prior
00995  * @param derivedMap     - returned derived headers.
00996  * @param headerMapValueDelimiter
00997  *                      - returned header values multiple value delimiter
00998  *
00999  * @return              - true if the file headers qualify as a models file,
01000  *                        false otherwise.
01001  * @return isModelData  - true if first record of data validates as
01002  *                        the correct schema.
01003  * @return headerMap    - filled in with file headers.
01004  * @return derivedMap   - possibley filled in with algorthem and model type
01005  *                        derived headers.
01006  *
01007  */
01008 /*****************************************************************************/
01009 static bool _SnpModelConverter_Hdf5GetModelHeaders(bool & isModelData, const std::string & modelFilePath, std::map< std::string, std::string *> & headerMap, const char * headerMapValueDelimiter, std::map< std::string, std::string > & derivedMap)
01010 {
01011 
01012   affx::File5_File* file5 = NULL;
01013   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
01014   bool isModel = true;
01015   std::string hdf5path;
01016 
01017   file5 = new affx::File5_File();
01018   file5->open(modelFilePath, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
01019 
01020   affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
01021   group5 = file5->openGroup("/", affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
01022 
01023   vector<string> names = group5->listNames();
01024   for(int i = 0; i < names.size(); i++) {
01025     if(names[i].find(".snp-posteriors") != string::npos) {
01026       hdf5path = names[i];
01027       break;
01028     }
01029 
01030   }
01031   group5->close();
01032   Freez(group5);
01033   if(hdf5path.empty()) {
01034     isModel = false;
01035   } else {
01036 
01037     tsv5 = file5->openTsv(hdf5path);
01038 
01039     string key, value;
01040     for(int i = 0; i < tsv5->getHeaderCount(); i++) {
01041       tsv5->getHeaderByIdx(i, &key, &value);
01042       _SnpModelConverter_AddHeaderToHeaderMap(headerMap, headerMapValueDelimiter, key, value);
01043     }
01044 
01045     // DATA CHECK
01046     snp_labeled_distribution p;
01047     p.Dist.Clear();
01048     if((tsv5->nextLevel(0) == affx::FILE5_OK) &&
01049         (tsv5->get(0, 0, &p.probeset_id) > -1)) {
01050 
01051       QuantLabelZ__readSnpPrior_tsv5_v2(tsv5, p.Dist);
01052       isModelData = (p.Dist.aa.m   != 0.0 ||
01053                      p.Dist.aa.ss  != 0.0 ||
01054                      p.Dist.aa.k   != 0.0 ||
01055                      p.Dist.aa.v   != 0.0 ||
01056                      p.Dist.aa.ym  != 0.0 ||
01057                      p.Dist.aa.yss != 0.0 ||
01058                      p.Dist.aa.xyss != 0.0);
01059     }
01060 
01061     if(!isModelData) {
01062       Verbose::out(4, "TSV5 snp data row does not match a valid format.");
01063     }
01064 
01065     // Currently only BLRMMP is suppported with A5 files.
01066     derivedMap[ALGORITHM_NAME] = SNP_MODEL_ALGORITHM_TYPE_GTC[SMC_GH_ALGORITHM_BRLMMP];
01067     derivedMap[MODEL_TYPE] = SNP_MODEL_MODEL_TYPE_GTC[SMC_GH_MODEL_UNKNOWN];
01068 
01069     tsv5->close();
01070     delete tsv5;
01071   }
01072   file5->close();
01073   delete file5;
01074 
01075   return isModel;
01076 }
01077 // end _SnpModelConverter_Hdf5GetModelHeaders
01078 /*****************************************************************************/
01079 /*****************************************************************************/
01080 /**
01081  * SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders, SQL header and data parser HELPER.
01082  * _SnpModelConverter_SqlGetModelHeaders
01083  *
01084  * @param modelFilePath - the models file, posterior or prior
01085  * @param headerMapValueDelimiter
01086  *                      - returned header values multiple value delimiter
01087  *
01088  * @return              - true if the file headers qualify as a models file,
01089  *                        false otherwise.
01090  * @return isModelData  - true if first record of data validates as
01091  *                        the correct schema.
01092  * @return headerMap    - filled in with file and SQL specific headers.
01093  *
01094  */
01095 /*****************************************************************************/
01096 static bool _SnpModelConverter_SqlGetModelHeaders(bool & isModelData, const std::string & modelFilePath, std::map< std::string, std::string *> & headerMap, const char * headerMapValueDelimiter)
01097 {
01098 
01099 
01100   // DATA CHECK
01101   // The SnpModelDb::isSqlModelFile call validates schema.
01102   isModelData = SnpModelDb::isSqlModelFile(modelFilePath);
01103 
01104   if(!isModelData) {
01105     return isModelData;
01106   }
01107 
01108   bool isModelHeader = true;
01109 
01110   try {
01111     SQLiteDatabase sqliteConn;
01112 
01113     sqliteConn.open(modelFilePath, true);
01114     std::string key;
01115     std::string value;
01116     SQLiteRecordset rset(sqliteConn);
01117     string sql = "select key, value from snp_model_meta;";
01118     rset.open(sql);
01119     while(rset.fetch()) {
01120       key = rset.getString(0);
01121       value = rset.getString(1);
01122       _SnpModelConverter_AddHeaderToHeaderMap(headerMap, headerMapValueDelimiter, key, value);
01123     }
01124     rset.close();
01125     sqliteConn.close();
01126   } catch(...) {
01127     isModelHeader = false;
01128   }
01129   return isModelHeader;
01130 }
01131 // end _SnpModelConverter_SqlGetModelHeaders
01132 /*****************************************************************************/
01133 /*****************************************************************************/
01134 /**
01135  * SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders, TSV header and data parser HELPER.
01136  * _SnpModelConverter_TsvGetModelHeaders
01137  *
01138  * @param modelFilePath - the models file, posterior or prior
01139  * @param derivedMap     - returned derived headers.
01140  * @param headerMapValueDelimiter
01141  *                      - returned header values multiple value delimiter
01142  *
01143  * @return              - true if the file headers qualify as a models file,
01144  *                        false otherwise.
01145  * @return isModelData  - true if first record of data validates as
01146  *                        the correct schema.
01147  * @return headerMap    - filled in with file headers.
01148  * @return derivedMap   - possibley filled in with algorthem and model type
01149  *                        derived headers.
01150  *
01151  */
01152 /*****************************************************************************/
01153 static bool _SnpModelConverter_TsvGetModelHeaders(bool & isModelData, const std::string & modelFilePath, std::map< std::string, std::string *> & headerMap, const char * headerMapValueDelimiter, std::map< std::string, std::string > & derivedMap)
01154 {
01155 
01156   affx::TsvFile tsv;
01157 
01158   // OPEN FILE
01159   tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
01160   tsv.m_optAbortOnError = false;
01161 
01162   try {
01163     int rv = tsv.openTable(modelFilePath);
01164     if(rv != affx::TSV_OK) {
01165       return false;
01166     }
01167     // DATA ACCESS: Make sure we can access data.
01168     std::string col;
01169     rv = tsv.nextLevel(0);
01170     if(rv != affx::TSV_OK) {
01171       return false;
01172     }
01173 
01174     // FIRST ROW SCHEMA CHECK
01175     std::vector< std::string > cols;
01176     for(int i = 0; i < tsv.getColumnCount(0); i++) {
01177       std::string col;
01178       tsv.get(0, i, col);
01179       cols.push_back(col);
01180     }
01181 
01182     SnpModelConverterAlgorithmColumns *algorithmColumns = NULL;
01183     for(int i = 0 ; !algorithmColumns && (i < SMC_ALGORITHM_COLUMNS_SIZE); i++) {
01184       const SnpModelConverterAlgorithmColumns &acr = SMC_ALGORITHM_COLUMNS[i];
01185       if(tsv.getColumnCount(0) < acr.m_numColumnsToCheck) {
01186         continue;
01187       }
01188       bool match = true;
01189       for(int j = 0; match && (j < acr.m_numColumnsToCheck); j++) {
01190         switch(j) {
01191         case 0:
01192           match = acr.m_col1.FullMatch(cols[j]);
01193           break;
01194         case 1:
01195           match = acr.m_col2.FullMatch(cols[j]);
01196           break;
01197         case 2:
01198           match = acr.m_col3.FullMatch(cols[j]);
01199           break;
01200         case 3:
01201           match = acr.m_col4.FullMatch(cols[j]);
01202           break;
01203         case 4:
01204           match = acr.m_col5.FullMatch(cols[j]);
01205           break;
01206         default:
01207           break;
01208         }
01209       }
01210       if(match) {
01211         algorithmColumns = (SnpModelConverterAlgorithmColumns *)&acr;
01212       }
01213     }
01214     if(algorithmColumns != NULL) {
01215       Verbose::out(4, "TSV file first row of data validated as a models file.");
01216       derivedMap[ALGORITHM_NAME] = algorithmColumns->m_algorithm;
01217       derivedMap[MODEL_TYPE] = algorithmColumns->m_type;
01218       isModelData = true;
01219     } else {
01220       isModelData = false;
01221       Verbose::out(4, "TSV Column headers or first row do not match valid formats.");
01222     }
01223 
01224     // GET HEADERS: and comments.
01225     headerMap.clear();
01226     tsv.headersBegin();
01227     std::string key, val;
01228     TsvFileHeaderLine *next = NULL;
01229     while((next = tsv.nextHeaderPtr()) != NULL) {
01230       key.clear();
01231       val.clear();
01232       if(next->m_key.empty()) {
01233         key = next->m_value;
01234         val = "comment only.";
01235       } else {
01236         key = next->m_key;
01237         val = next->m_value;
01238       }
01239       _SnpModelConverter_AddHeaderToHeaderMap(headerMap, headerMapValueDelimiter, key, val);
01240 
01241     }
01242 
01243     tsv.clear();
01244   }
01245   catch (...) {
01246     return false;
01247   }
01248 
01249   return true;
01250 }
01251 // end _SnpModelConverter_TsvGetModelHeaders
01252 /*****************************************************************************/
01253 /*****************************************************************************/
01254 /**
01255  * SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders, VALIDATION HELPER
01256  * _SnpModelConverter_ValidateGetModelHeaders
01257  *
01258  * @param modelFilePath - the models file, posterior or prior
01259  * @param headerMapType - 1.) empty for just the raw headers
01260  *                        2.) "GTC4.1" - GTC 4.1 map
01261  * @param headerMapValueDelimiter
01262  *                      - returned header values multiple value delimiter
01263  * @param derivedMap     - Derived headers.
01264  *
01265  * @return              -  @validations filled in with normalized header values.
01266  * @return              - true if the file headers qualifyas a models file,
01267  *                        false otherwise.
01268  *
01269  */
01270 /*****************************************************************************/
01271 static bool _SnpModelConverter_ValidateGetModelHeaders(const std::string modelFilePath, const std::map< std::string, std::string *> & headerMap, std::map< std::string, std::string > & derivedMap,  const char * headerMapValueDelimiter, std::vector< SnpModelConverterValidation > & validations)
01272 {
01273 
01274   bool isModel = true;
01275 
01276   std::map < std::string, std::string >::const_iterator its;
01277   for ( its = derivedMap.begin(); its != derivedMap.end(); its++ ) {
01278     Verbose::out(5, ToStr("derivedMap ") +  its->first +  "=" + its->second );
01279   }
01280 
01281   // Ok, validate only the first occurence
01282   // In the case of multiple headers matching we ignore
01283   // everything but the first.
01284   for(int i = 0; i < SMC_VALIDATION_SIZE ; i ++) {
01285     std::map< std::string, std::string * >::const_iterator it;
01286     std::vector < std::string > derivedMatch;
01287     std::vector < std::string > fileMatch;
01288     std::vector < std::string > headerMatch;
01289 
01290     
01291     // DERIVED FROM DATA
01292     if(derivedMap.count(SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_name) && !derivedMap[SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_name].empty()) {
01293       derivedMatch.push_back(SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_name);
01294       derivedMatch.push_back(derivedMap[SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_name]);
01295     }
01296 
01297     // HEADER MATCH:  no choice but to walk through the list.
01298     for(it = headerMap.begin(); it != headerMap.end(); it++) {
01299       if(SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_validHeaderRE.FullMatch(it->first)) {
01300         if (headerMatch.empty() ) {
01301           headerMatch.push_back(SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_name);
01302           headerMatch.push_back(*(it->second));
01303         }
01304         else if ( headerMapValueDelimiter != NULL ) {
01305           _SnpModelConverter_AddHeaderToHeaderMap(headerMatch, headerMapValueDelimiter, SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_name, *(it->second));
01306         }
01307         else {
01308           break;
01309         }
01310       }
01311     }
01312 
01313     // FILE NAME MATCH
01314     std::string fileToMatch = modelFilePath;
01315     if(headerMap.count(FILE_INPUT)) {
01316       it = headerMap.find(FILE_INPUT);
01317       fileToMatch = *(it->second);
01318     }
01319 
01320     if(SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_validFileNameRE.FullMatch(Fs::basename(fileToMatch))) {
01321       fileMatch.push_back(SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_name);
01322       fileMatch.push_back(SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_value);
01323     }
01324 
01325     // VALIDATATION RESULTS CHECK
01326     if(!headerMatch.size() && !derivedMatch.size() && !fileMatch.size()) {
01327       if(! SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_emptyOk) {
01328         Verbose::out(4, SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_name +
01329                      ToStr(" header missing and is required. ") +
01330                      SMC_VALIDATION[i].m_description);
01331         isModel = false;
01332       }
01333     } else if(!headerMatch.size() || (headerMatch[1].empty())) {
01334       if(derivedMatch.size()) {
01335         headerMatch = derivedMatch;
01336       } else if(fileMatch.size()) {
01337         headerMatch = fileMatch;
01338       }
01339     }
01340     // SAVE VALIDATION FOR OUTPUT IF OK
01341     if(! headerMatch.empty()) {
01342       validations.push_back(SMC_VALIDATION[i]);
01343       validations.back().m_value = headerMatch[1];
01344     }
01345   }
01346 
01347   return isModel;
01348 }
01349 // end _SnpModelConverter_ValidateGetModelHeaders
01350 /*****************************************************************************/
01351 /*****************************************************************************/
01352 /**
01353  * SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders
01354  * Given a potentional model file return the headers.
01355  * Model files can be of type db, A5, or TSV.
01356  *
01357  * @param modelFilePath - the models file, posterior or prior
01358  * @param headerMapType - 1.) empty for just the raw headers
01359  *                        2.) "GTC4.1" - GTC 4.1 map
01360  * @param headerMap     - return header key/value pairs
01361  * @param headerMapValueDelimiter
01362  *                      - return multiple header values using delimiter
01363  * If this value is passed in then all ambiguous matching
01364  * header values are returned delimited by the passed in value.
01365  * If this value is not passed (NULL) then only the first value
01366  * of the first qualifying header is returned.
01367  *
01368  * @return              - true if the file qualifies as a models file,
01369  *                        false otherwise.
01370  */
01371 /*****************************************************************************/
01372 bool SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders(const std::string & modelFilePath, const std::string & headerMapType, std::map< std::string, std::string *> & headerMap, const char * headerMapValueDelimiter)
01373 {
01374 
01375   bool isModelHeader = false;
01376   bool isModelData = false;
01377   int derivedType = SnpModelConverter::NONE;
01378   std::map< std::string, std::string > derivedMap;
01379   std::vector< std::string > arrayResults;
01380   std::string uncModelFilePath = Fs::Unc(modelFilePath);
01381 
01382   Verbose::out(4, "SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders BEGIN");
01383   // GET HEADERS
01384   if(!Fs::fileExists(uncModelFilePath)) {
01385     APT_ERR_ABORT(ToStr(" SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders : ") + uncModelFilePath + " file not found.");
01386   }
01387 
01388   if(!headerMapType.empty()) {
01389     bool okType = false;
01390     for(int i = 0; i < SnpModelConverter::LAST_DERIVED_TYPE; i++) {
01391       if(headerMapType == SNP_MODEL_DERIVED_HEADER_TYPE_STRINGS[i]) {
01392         derivedType = i;
01393         okType = true;
01394         break;
01395       }
01396     }
01397     if(!okType) {
01398       Err::errAbort(ToStr("SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders invalid header type passed: ") + headerMapType);
01399     }
01400   }
01401     
01402   if(File5_File::isHdf5file(uncModelFilePath)) {
01403     isModelHeader = _SnpModelConverter_Hdf5GetModelHeaders(isModelData, uncModelFilePath, headerMap, headerMapValueDelimiter, derivedMap);
01404   } else if(SnpModelDb::isSqlModelFile(uncModelFilePath)) {
01405     isModelHeader = _SnpModelConverter_SqlGetModelHeaders(isModelData, uncModelFilePath,  headerMap, headerMapValueDelimiter);
01406   } else if(  !Fs::isBinaryFile( uncModelFilePath ) ) {
01407     isModelHeader = _SnpModelConverter_TsvGetModelHeaders(isModelData, uncModelFilePath,  headerMap, headerMapValueDelimiter, derivedMap);
01408   }
01409 
01410   if(isModelData) {
01411     SnpModelConverter dummy;
01412     try {
01413       dummy.getArrayTypeAndAlgorithm(uncModelFilePath, arrayResults);
01414       if(! derivedMap.count(CHIP_TYPE)) {
01415         if(arrayResults[0].empty()) {
01416           derivedMap[CHIP_TYPE] = UNKNOWN_CHIP_TYPE;
01417         } else {
01418           derivedMap[CHIP_TYPE] = arrayResults[0];
01419         }
01420       }
01421       if(! derivedMap.count(ALGORITHM_NAME)) {
01422         derivedMap[ALGORITHM_NAME] = arrayResults[1];
01423       }
01424     }
01425     catch (...) {
01426     }
01427   }
01428 
01429   // VALIDATE HEADERS
01430   std::vector< SnpModelConverterValidation > validations;
01431   isModelHeader = isModelHeader && _SnpModelConverter_ValidateGetModelHeaders(uncModelFilePath, headerMap, derivedMap,  headerMapValueDelimiter, validations);
01432 
01433   // DERIVED HEADERS
01434   if(isModelHeader && (derivedType != SnpModelConverter::NONE)) {
01435     (*SMC_ADD_DERIVED_HEADERS_CALLBACK[derivedType].m_callback)(headerMap, validations, derivedMap, headerMapValueDelimiter);
01436   }
01437 
01438   Verbose::out(4, "SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders END");
01439 
01440   return isModelHeader && isModelData;
01441 }
01442 // end SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders
01443 /*****************************************************************************/
